attributes.action: Bring in a law to stop clowns stalking and threatening People with weapons ASAP
attributes.additional_details: If you need any info on these clowns attacks search on your local news web pages and national tv news
attributes.background: Just lately across the country clowns have been terrorising kids and adults alike by scaring them with axes / hammers and other weapons I'm asking the government to bring in a law to jail these people who dress up and terrorise people before someone gets hurt or worse killed

rejection.details: Stalking and threatening people with weapons are already against the law. It's therefore not clear what you would like Parliament to change.
